data.name: AsteRoid Rage
data.detailed_description:
AsteRoid Rage is a short casual physics game about smashing planets! It can, in most cases, be finished in a single sitting and is best played as a small distraction while you wait for something else.

  • Break your way through 101 handmade levels!
  • Use cosmological and technological phenomena to ensure total destruction!
  • Tour a procedurally generated universe, never seeing the same background twice!
  • All these other things!

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3
  • Additional Notes: AsteRoid Rage is not a resource intensive game and should work on all relatively modern hardware.
